message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $12,000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. It's a good starting point, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'd be willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11,200. This is a great compromise, considering the product's value to you is $12,000. What do you think?
